content.yext/answer:
Dime is proud to announce that the Avenue M branch is open as of April 1, 2020. Please check the modified hours schedule before heading to any branch.

Thank you,

Your Dime Community Bank Team
content.yext/name: Avenue M Branch Update - As of April 1, 2020
content.yext/question: Avenue M Branch Update - As of April 1, 2020

Gracias,
 
 Su equipo de Dime Community Bank

Merci,

Votre équipe Dime Community Bank

Il tuo team Dime Community Bank
